**Government Tender Announcement**
================================================ =
Department of National Defence Solicitation for External Interviews
--------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Details

**Title**: Staffing Consultant Services for General Officer/Flag Officer Ranks

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01015697

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal

**Procurement Category**: Services

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement

### Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals from qualified consultants to provide staffing support for the Chief of the Defence Staff in the development of recommendations for promotions to and within the General Officer/Flag Officer (GOFO) ranks through conducting and summarizing external interviews.

The contract period, dated from the contract award to 31 March 2025, has an optional extension of up to 3 additional one-year periods. The successful contractor will need to meet specific security requirements, and a detailed security screening should be consulted in Part 6 of the solicitation.

### Bid Submission Instructions

Prospective bidders must provide all required information, as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, in order to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants. Bidders should refer to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada for further information.

### Required Skills

* Applicants must have a 1.8 Staffing Consultant Senior with relevant experience in conducting and summarizing external interviews.

### Security Requirements

Prospective bidders must meet specific security requirements detailed in Part 6 of the solicitation.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the qualitative and quantitative requirements stated in the solicitation.

### Tender Closing

All proposals must be submitted electronically by 14:00 Eastern Time on December 16, 2022.

### Contact Information

All inquiries regarding this solicitation should be directed to Jasdeep Jande at email [jasdeep.jande@forces.gc.ca](mailto:jasdeep.jande@forces.gc.ca) or at phone number 613-298-3572. Interested parties may also view the solicitation documentation on [Public Works and Government Services Canada](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/).

Please direct any questions to the above contact. [Note: I also noticed the ellipsis at the end which is unusual, so I removed it.]
